name: When I Am Gone
description:
When I Am Gone is a story-driven VR game woven together by real-life human memories which have been preserved aboard an orbiting space station in the early 22nd century.

You are the last remaining human aboard the Orbital Museum Of Civilization. It’s now up to you (and your trusted, robot sidekick) to explore the museum, collect clues, hack into human memories, and solve a puzzle that can prevent humanity’s extinction.

Using your Bio-connected Hand Interface, you can access thousands of preserved memories, collected from a diverse population, and experience a mind-bending narrative that connects us all.
